Trigger.name: Carrion count
Trigger.script:
mm.stats.carrion = tonumber(multimatches[2][2])
selectCurrentLine() setFgColor(255,224,115) setBgColor(19,8,115) resetFormat() deselect()
selectString(" "..mm.stats.carrion .." ", 1) setFgColor(0,255,0) setBgColor(19,8,70) resetFormat() deselect()
local percent = math.floor((100/75) * tonumber(mm.stats.carrion ))
echo(string.rep(" ", 56 - #line))
local width = math.floor((percent * 30) / 100) fg("a_green") echo(string.rep([[|]], width)) fg("a_darkgreen") echo(string.rep("-", 30 - width))
fg("a_darkgrey") echo(" " .. percent .. "% carrion") resetFormat()

regexCodeList.string: You feel that your stomach holds
^You feel that your stomach holds (\d+) chunks of flesh\.$

Trigger.name: Flies
Trigger.script: mm.stats.carrion = (mm.stats.carrion or 0) - 10 if (mm.stats.carrion) < 0 then mm.stats.carrion = 0 end

regexCodeList.string: Cawing loudly to Crow, you build up a well of festering, stinking vomit in your throat before spewing it in a long stream onto the ground, forming a rancid puddle. The air suddenly vibrates with the sound of countless insect wings as a great cloud of flies swarms in, buzzing about the air in a seething mass as they feed hungrily on the sickly sweet vomit.

Trigger.name: Belch
Trigger.script: mm.stats.carrion = (mm.stats.carrion or 0) - 2 if (mm.stats.carrion) < 0 then mm.stats.carrion = 0 end

regexCodeList.string: You swallow some air and allow it to brew in your stomach before belching it back up powerfully, bringing with it the strong and repugnant stench of carrion.
Swallowing some more air, you allow it to bask in the carrion in your stomach before belching it back up, reaffirming the wafting aroma of rotting flesh that permeates the air.

Trigger.name: Heal
Trigger.script: mm.stats.carrion = (mm.stats.carrion or 0) - 2 if (mm.stats.carrion) < 0 then mm.stats.carrion = 0 end

regexCodeList.string: You regurgitate a chunk of flesh from your stomach and then devour the juicy morsel.

Trigger.name: Spy
Trigger.script: mm.stats.carrion = (mm.stats.carrion or 0) - 2 if (mm.stats.carrion) < 0 then mm.stats.carrion = 0 end

regexCodeList.string: You chew on some carrion as you continue to listen to your nest.
